content:
I like Zulip a lot but I miss typing notifications in streams and topics. According to this they are available in DMs: https://zulip.com/help/typing-notifications

It looks like there's an open issue: https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/11152

And there's a PR at https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/17040 with somewhat recent commits (Feb 2022).

I've been trying a bit to move that pull request along but they insist on rebasing and I was having trouble resolving merge conflicts.

Last night I tried squashing the six commits first and then rebasing. This worked in so far as I was able to at least push branch to my fork, even if I'm not done getting the code working. (I only this morning noticed that the PR has a "size: XML" label on it. :sweat_smile: I can at least run tests and see what I broke and got wrong.
I gave up on making a pull request, BUT a new PR just emerged! https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/26904 :tada:
Merged and deployed! Now we can see typing notifications in streams! :tada:
